data.text: @Spurserk @SpursOfficial Far from it, it helps to bring people together, Arsenal fans excepted 🤭

@Spurserk @SpursOfficial I'm with Russia 

The Vast NATO Expansion since 1997 has provoked this Defensive Reaction from Russia

I blame ... unambiguously ....NATO

The sole reason for creating NATO was to militarily oppose the Russian Federation.

No peaceful intent whatsoever
@spursshow @SpursOfficial I’m not too bad thanks, getting better, it’s nothing really though is it compared to these poor people in Ukraine.
@Spurserk @SpursOfficial Sorry to hear that Danny hope you recover soon
